## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.
Example: "I'm always frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Alternative Solutions
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Case
Describe how this feature would be used:
- Who would use it?
- When would they use it?
- Why is it important?

## Implementation Ideas
If you have ideas about how this could be implemented, please share them.

## Examples
If this feature exists in other applications, please provide examples or links.

## Priority
How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical - Blocking my use of the application
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve my workflow
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Minor improvement

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or mockups about the feature request here.

## Checklist
- [ ] I have checked existing feature requests
- [ ] I have checked the roadmap in CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have described the use case clearly
- [ ] I have considered alternative solutions
